Cara Cepat Install Gentoo Linux

25 September 2022
#teknologi
  • Format Drive
  • Mount Partition
  • Stage 3
  • Chroot
  • Update Repo Portage
  • User Accounts
  • System
    • /etc/fstab
    • Hostname
    • Timezone

Format Drive

root # cfdisk /dev/sda

root # mkfs.ext4 /dev/sda1

Mount Partition

root # mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo
root # mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/gentoo

Stage 3

root # cd /mnt/gentoo

root # wget https://bouncer.gentoo.org/fetch/root/all/releases/amd64/autobuilds/20220924T034745Z/stage3-amd64-desktop-openrc-20220924T034745Z.tar.xz

root # tar -xf stage3*

Chroot

root # cd /mnt/gentoo
root # mount --types proc /proc /mnt/gentoo/proc
root # mount --rbind /sys /mnt/gentoo/sys
root # mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/sys
root # mount --rbind /dev /mnt/gentoo/dev
root # mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/dev
root # mount --bind /run /mnt/gentoo/run
root # mount --make-slave /mnt/gentoo/run
root # cp /etc/resolv.conf etc && chroot . /bin/bash
root # source /etc/profile

Update Repo Portage

root # emerge-webrsync

User Accounts

root # passwd

root # useradd -g users -G wheel,portage,audio,video,usb,cdrom -m username
root # passwd username

System

/etc/fstab

/dev/sda3		/		ext4		noatime		0 1

Hostname

dns_domain_lo="mynetwork.net"

Timezone

root # ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Helsinki /etc/localtime

Komentar

Kirim komentar anda ke email dengan subjek judul postingan ini.
